title: The New Evil
description: Gone forever…Corky and the Shadyside cheerleaders are sure that the evil spirit is destroyed. The terror is over.Then Hannah is mysteriously thrown through the car window. And Naomi is nearly burned to death. One horrifying accident after another. And now Corky can no longer keep her greatest fear to herself—the evil is back!But where is it?Corky, Kimmy, and Debra aren’t waiting to find out. They have a plan to draw the evil out. Draw it out and destroy it for good. Unless, of course, the evil destroys them first…
author: R.L. Stine
